item.title: Four attacks in 48 hours: How east Australia's beaches became a 'perfect storm' for sharks
item.description: Human-shark encounters in Australia are rising - but experts are keen to point out it isn’t the animals’ fault.

item.title: How the Oct 7 Hamas terror attacks exposed long-running concerns about UNRWA, new film charges
item.description: Tracing UNRWA from 1949 to today, the film examines refugee policy, weak oversight and alleged links to Hamas control in Gaza, raising questions about the agencyâ€™s role and accountability.

item.title: Wave of Israeli attacks kills two in Lebanon in latest ceasefire violation
item.description: Deadly Israeli air strikes target areas across south Lebanon and the Bekaa Valley amid simmering regional tensions.
